title: TRACK LAYOUT overview page
user_story:
As a visitor
I want to see a list of all TRACK LAYOUTS
So I can get a general idea of the different types that exist
And by scrolling through them find interesting ones
description:
* There is a dedicated page (with a dedicated URL) where all TRACK LAYOUTS are presented.
* A warning message is shown when there are no TRACK LAYOUTS.
* The overview page always returns with status code \`200\`, no matter if any TRACK LAYOUT exists or not.
* By default, the TRACK LAYOUTS are sorted \`ascending\` by their \`name\`.
* The sorting is always case-insensitive.
* Each TRACK LAYOUT is presented with its primary information and a link to its detail page.
* The overview displays at most 100 TRACK LAYOUTS at once.
* When there are more than 100 TRACK LAYOUTS then the \`pagination\` feature is activated.
* Pagination allows the user to scroll through all TRACK LAYOUTS - 100 items at a time.
* The user is able to bookmark and revisit any paginated TRACK LAYOUT page.
